CIPHER.62.cipherString: Every age has a kind of universal genius, which inclines those that live in it to some particular studies.
CIPHER.62.question: The following quote by John Dryden has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  What did they say?
CIPHER.62.author: John Dryden

CIPHER.79.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 8096 15347 61434 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.82.cipherString: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
CIPHER.82.question: A quote by Ellen DeGeneres has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter X decodes to E.
CIPHER.82.author: Ellen DeGeneres

CIPHER.74.cipherString: ...Life is much simpler if you don't notice anything....
CIPHER.74.question: A quote by Tom Upton has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with LIFE.
CIPHER.74.author: Tom Upton

CIPHER.73.cipherString: Yes, victory is sweet, but it doesn't necessarily make life any easier the next season or even the next day.
CIPHER.73.question: A quote by Phil Jackson has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K2 keyword.  You are told that the letter E decodes to S.
CIPHER.73.author: Phil Jackson

CIPHER.63.cipherString: The excitement of dreams coming true is beyond the description of words.
CIPHER.63.question: The following quote by Lailah Gifty Akita needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitition Cipher with a keyword of HOPE and polybius key of SPARKLING.
CIPHER.63.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

CIPHER.68.cipherString: Ever won wants two live on top uv teh mountan, butt awl teh hapiness and groth ocurs wile your climing it.
CIPHER.68.question: A friend who can't spell or type very well entered in a quote by Andy Rooney and encoded it as an Aristocrat using a K1 cipher.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.68.author: Andy Rooney

CIPHER.78.cipherString: Sorry I'm late. I was trying to think of ways to get out of this.
CIPHER.78.question: The following symbols are a Baconian Encoding of a phrase.  What do they decode to?
CIPHER.78.author: Unknown

CIPHER.80.cipherString: Si un hombre habla o actúa con un pensamiento puro, la felicidad lo sigue como una sombra que nunca lo abandona.
CIPHER.80.question: A quote attributed to Buddha has been translated into Spanish and encoded as an Aristocrat using an English K1 keyword alphabet.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.80.author: Buddha
CIPHER.80.translation: If a man speaks or acts with a pure thought, happiness follows him like a shadow that never leaves him.

CIPHER.77.cipherString: A friend is a second self.
CIPHER.77.question: Decode the following proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of HOLD.
CIPHER.77.author: Proverb

CIPHER.70.cipherString: Every traveller has a home of his own, and he learns to appreciate it the more from his wandering.
CIPHER.70.question: Charles Dickens wrote the following quote which has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K3 key phrase.  What was the Key Phrase used to encode it?
CIPHER.70.author: Dickens.

CIPHER.76.cipherString: Success is when you are able to reproduce the process.
CIPHER.76.question: The following is a Baconian cipher encoding a quote by Kenneth Mwale.  What did they say?
CIPHER.76.author: Kenneth Mwale

CIPHER.148.cipherString: We live out our lives as we are meant to live them-with some choice, with some chance, but mostly as a result of the persons we are.
CIPHER.148.question: A quote by Terry Brooks has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the letter E decodes to be S.
CIPHER.148.author: Terry Brooks

CIPHER.71.cipherString: One thing at a time: It is important that we focus on the task that is at present in hand.
CIPHER.71.question: Nihilist Decode Quote Author: John Hughes
CIPHER.71.author: John Hughes

CIPHER.72.cipherString: Consciousness is a dance between perception and memory.
CIPHER.72.question: Jay Nelson wrote the following quote which has been encoded as a Complete Columnar which decodes to include the word DANCE in it.
CIPHER.72.author: Jay Nelson

CIPHER.67.cipherString: Nothing in this world happens by chance.
CIPHER.67.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Paulo Coelho using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with NOTH
CIPHER.67.author: Paulo Coelho

CIPHER.69.cipherString: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
CIPHER.69.question: The following quote by Aristotle needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of LIFE
CIPHER.69.author: Aristotle

CIPHER.75.cipherString: Climbing to the top demands strength, whether it is to the top of Mount Everest or to the top of your career.
CIPHER.75.question: A quote by A.P.J. Abdul Kalam has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the word THE occurs at least 3 times in the decoded text.
CIPHER.75.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

CIPHER.81.cipherString: The baby bat Screamed out in fright, 'Turn on the dark, I'm afraid of the light.
CIPHER.81.question: A humorous quote by Shel Silverstein which has the phrase TURN ON in it has been encoded as a Complete Columnar cipher.  What is the full quote?
CIPHER.81.author: Shel Silverstein

CIPHER.64.cipherString: Success is focusing the full power of all you are on what you have a burning desire to achieve.
CIPHER.64.question: The following Aristocrat is a quote by Wilfred Peterson.  What does it decode to?
CIPHER.64.author: Wilfred Peterson

CIPHER.65.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 150628 30449. What do they decode to?
